Reviews.Title: “good hotel”
Reviews.Author: gisoo
Reviews.Content: i had a business trip to istanbul last week,every thing is small but clean and new,the hotel has just renewed,the staff are so friendly that you can find it rarely in other hotel in turkeybut its noisy because of libian people who are there.the libian people argue always and talk loud all the time

Reviews.Title: “Don't trust this hotel”
Reviews.Author: Timothy Y
Reviews.Content: I confirmed the room in this hotel but they told me that their rooms were overbooked when I arrived. And they wanted to transfer me to a 3 star hotel. Don't trust this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “I m Muslim and I advise everybody stay there because very comfortable hotel and servise ,everything hight quality”
Reviews.Author: Abuumeyr
Reviews.Content: Super super super when you go to Istanbul tray marmaray hotel if you can find free room

Reviews.Title: “Make sure taxis don't drop you at Marmama instead of Marmaray!”
Reviews.Author: Dkhosrow
Reviews.Content: If you are taking a cab to the hotel, make sure the driver understands it's Marmaray in Yanikapi, not Marmara in Taksim. Itâ€™s because even Taxi drivers donâ€™t know much about this hotel and might take you to the wrong one. It is better if you have a direction map printed to show to driver if you donâ€™t have GPS on you. About the hotel, everything is great except for the small rooms. The bed was a bit small too, but very soft and totally comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: benducci
Reviews.Content: nice hotel,hotel staff excellent. Main tourist attractions-need to walk 15-20 minutes and then "tram". Steep hill to walk to main areas in Sultanahmet. Nice places to eat close by. If you are interested in night life-nothing in the area and you would need to take train or tram.View from dining room is nice and breakfast is average but was included in room price-so good value for money. Hotel is very good value for money. Room was spotless and bathroom had shower only which for us is all we need. Hotel is clean and we had a turkish bath(? hamam) in the spa in the basement and again excellent and good value for money. A very nice couple run the spa.

Reviews.Title: “Do not lose your time to look for a hotel, Marmaray is the best choice.”
Reviews.Author: radia-from-Algeria
Reviews.Content: Marmaray hotel is located in a very strategic place; it is surrounded by famous historical places such as: Blue mosque, Aya-Sofia, Place of Topkapi, University of Istanbul and not far also le Grand bazaar. As concerns the hotel, is built in the modern style, the rooms are quit small but well arranged, its workers are very helpful and kind. The breakfast room is found in the top floor, it has a panoramic and a wonderful view of the Marmara Sea; that you wished to see each morning. Other impotent places that I forget to mention are the Princessesâ€™ islands, the boat takes visitors till there, and you will get the opportunity to see Bosphore and Marmara Sea in the same time. For the visitors who like shopping, they have to visit Taksim and Beyazit, the bus station and tramway are not far from the hotel. For us, it was really an excellent and unforgettable 'Honey-moon' into Turkey. Do not lose your time to look for a hotel, Marmaray is the best choice.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: ColinaAlmeria
Reviews.Content: Although I do not think the Marmaray should be classed as a 4 star hotel, we did find the staff very helpful and the decor in the common areas super. The room amenities were basic, with cheap furniture but comfortable beds. The toilet broke every day and the air conditioning never worked at all. The location is not great or scenic. The breakfast was uninspired. I would stay there again if I was on a short visit but it really isn't 4 star so not good value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Acceptable hotel for Istanbul visit”
Reviews.Author: Profigast
Reviews.Content: The hotel is located close to the Yenikapi train station (soon also with subway connection). It is in walking distance (20 min) to many of Istanbul's sights. The quarter is full of other small hotels. The house is modernized, rooms are small, but functional. The breakfast room in the top floor has a panoramic view of the Marmara Sea. Service is o.k., breakfast is included and has enough Turkish flavor to get in the mood. Sty there, when you need something acceptable at fair rates.

HotelInfo.Name: Marmaray Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Guvenlik Caddesi No:43 Yenikapi, Istanbul 34130, Turkey
